name: Parry locate
script:
if not IsTargetted(matches[2]) then return end
if ak.ai() then return end
if ak.limbs.currentbreak.limb and #ak.limbs.currentbreak.limb > 0 and ak.limbs.currentbreak.who[#ak.limbs.currentbreak.who] == target then 
   targetparry = ak.limbs.currentbreak.limb[#ak.limbs.currentbreak.limb]
   cecho("<cyan>

 YOU HIT PARRY(<white>"..targetparry:title().."<cyan>)!!

")
   cecho("<yellow>

 YOU HIT PARRY(<white>"..targetparry:title().."<yellow>)!!

") 
end
matches: ^([\w'\-]+) parries the attack with a deft manoeuvre.$
^([\w'\-]+) steps into the attack, grabs your arm, and throw
^A chaos orb intercepts the attack against (\+) and renders it harmless\.$
^([\w'\-]+) moves into your attack, knocking your blow aside before viciously countering with a strike to your head\.$
